moves.name: Potion
moves.effect: Restores an ally’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of lowering the target’s Defense by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Let’s Go!
moves.effect: Charges the user’s move gauge by 2 for each allied sync pair on the field. When used in a co-op battle, charges the move gauges of all allied players by 2 instead. Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks.

syncMove.name: Endless Possibilities Extreme Evoboost
syncMove.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by its current move level. Raises the Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, and accuracy of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

passives.name: Benefactor
passives.description: Transfers this sync pair’s stat increases to the sync pair that will switch in when this sync pair switches out.

grid.bonus: Potion:Master Healer 2- Increases the amount of HP restored by the user’s healing moves.
Potion:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Potion:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Potion:Friend Mend 9- When a move targeting an allied sync pair (excluding field effects) is successful, removes all status conditions from the allied sync pair affected by the move.
Tackle:Stoic 1- Has a chance (20%) of raising the user’s Defense by one stat rank after its Pokémon uses a move.
Tackle:Move Gauge Refresh 9- Charges the user’s move gauge by one when its move is successful.
Tackle:Staggering 2- Has a chance (30%) of making the target flinch when the user’s attack move is successful.
Iron Tail:On a Roll 1- Raises the chance of lowering stat values with the additional effects of moves.
Iron Tail:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Let’s Go!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Let’s Go!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Let’s Go!:Barricade Buddies 1- Raises the Sp. Def of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user’s move is successful.
Endurance- When the user enters battle with full HP, applies the Enduring effect to it.
Power Flux 5- The fuller the move gauge when moves are selected, the more this powers up moves.
Recuperation 1- Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP after using its sync move.
Adrenaline 1- Reduces the sync move countdown by 1 the first time the user’s sync move is used each battle.
